paper_abstract: We consider the EDITING TO A GRAPH OF GIVEN DEGREES problem that asks for a graph G, non-negative integers d,k and a function delta: V(G) -> {1, ... , d}, whether it is possible to obtain a graph G' from G such that the degree of v is delta(v) for any vertex v by at most k vertex or edge deletions or edge additions. We construct an FPT-algorithm for EDITING TO A GRAPH OF GIVEN DEGREES parameterized by d + k. We complement this result by showing that the problem has no polynomial kernel unless NP subset of coNP/poly. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Editing to a Graph of Given Degrees
